Tracker Hatuba:
Embryo?! The ones we chased from Talking Island to the Wastelands are also involved with the Suspicious Vagabond?
And he gloated on his dying breath that the Seal of Punishment would break? That a new goddess would win the love and support of all the world? What horrible news! He must have meant Shilen would be a new goddess. At least... at least we were right. Thank you for confirming this unsettling information. Now we can plan our defense.
